elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} Remove all boosts from Characters in play and in Reserve. Then, depending on the number of boosts removed this way:  • 1+: I gain 1 boost per card in your Reserve.  • 4+: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.  • 9+: Target Expedition moves forward one region.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
{D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.
elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} Remove all boosts from Characters in play and in Reserve. Then, depending on the number of boosts removed this way:  • 1+: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Artist or Song, draw it, otherwise discard it.  • 4+: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.  • 9+: Target Expedition moves forward one region.

{H} Remove all boosts from Characters in play and in Reserve. Then, depending on the number of boosts removed this way:  • 1+: Create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in your other Expedition (the one I'm not in).  • 4+: Create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in each of your Expeditions.  • 9+: Your opponent's Expedition facing me moves backwards one region.

{H} Remove all boosts from Characters in play and in Reserve. Then, depending on the number of boosts removed this way:  • 1+: Target Character gains 1 boost.  • 4+: Create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in target Expedition.  • 9+: Your opponent's Expedition facing me moves backwards one region.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} Remove all boosts from Characters in play and in Reserve. Then, depending on the number of boosts removed this way:  • 1+: I gain 1 boost.  • 4+: Each player discards their hand and their Reserve, then draws three cards.  • 9+: Your opponent's Expedition facing me moves backwards one region.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.
